<h1 align="center">
  Convo - Create meaningful conversations online
</h1>
Convo is an online game to help you make a meaningful conversation with your friends and loved ones.

It consists of a series of questions that you need to answer with honest and sincere answers.

Answer the questions shown on the card one by one with your partner. The extensional questions regarding the topic can make the conversation more engaging.


Convo is an unofficial online game adaptation of the [Eksplorasa board game](https://www.instagram.com/kartueksplorasa/). All the questions and property rights are owned by the Eksplorasa team.

![Convo](https://media.giphy.com/media/FrAajLVmybhCUclxpR/giphy.gif)

## [Demo](https://hackrob-convo.vercel.app)
